item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0386; 08:18AM; 1600 S Orchard Av; #PicoUnion; Firefighters arrived to find a two-story duplex with fire in one unit and the attic. A coordinated attack between rooftop ventilation and interior fire attack resulted in 30 firefighters extinguishing the flames in 13 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E13 E15 E211 E226 RA15 RA813 T11 T26; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0386; 08:05AM; 1600 S Orchard Av; #PicoUnion; Multi-family residential with fire in one unit and the attic. Offensive mode. ; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E13 E15 E211 E226 RA15 RA813 T11 T26; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1137; 03:29PM; 1111 E 28th St; #CentralAlameda; It took 38 firefighters 20 minutes to extinguish heavy fire in a two-story vacant home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E10 E14 E15 E21 E221 E233 RA14 RA25 SQ21 T21 T33; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1137; 03:29PM; 1111 E 28th St; #CentralAlameda; Two-story home with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E14 E15 E21 E221 RA14 SQ21 T21; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1878; 11:25PM; 5037 W Exposition Bl; #WestAdams; Firefighters encountered a well-fortified unit with smoke showing amongst a row of commercials. Firefighters were able to make entry from the rear, and 39 firefighters extinguished the flames in 24 minutes, without injury. The adjacent units were spared, with help from division walls (fire barriers) within the row of businesses. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E226 E261 E294 E34 E43 E61 E68 E94 EA1 EM11 RA94 T26 T61 T94; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1878; 11:01PM; 5037 W Exposition Bl; #WestAdams; Row of commercial buildings with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E226 E261 E294 E34 E43 E61 E68 E94 EM11 RA94 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1390; 05:28PM; 3231 N Amethyst St; #LincolnHeights; Two-story descending hillside home with light smoke showing. Firefighters made entry and found fire in one room of the ground level. It took 18 firefighters 16 minutes (5:22) from the time of alarm to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E16 E212 E47 RA47 T12; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1200; 03:59PM; 10471 N Glenoaks Bl; #Pacoima; It took 30 firefighters 17 minutes to extinguish one mobile home and three adjacent vehicles that became involved with the fire. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E239 E24 E298 E7 E98 RA7 T39 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 03/02/2023 INC#1175

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1175; 03:53PM; 220 S Hoover St; #Westlake; Firefighters arrived to find a two-story multi-family residential structure with fire showing. The attic was well-involved with fire, and partial involvement on the second floor. It took 67 firefighters 25 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the first is under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E203 E211 E220 E235 E3 E35 E6 EM11 RA1 RA11 RA6 SQ21 T11 T20 T3 T35 UR3; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1200; 03:42PM; 10471 N Glenoaks Bl; #Pacoima; One mobile home burning, with flames threatening adjacent units on either side.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E239 E24 E298 E7 E98 RA7 T39 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
